snippet: MALINA--Ruth, 97, died peacefully on December 25 in New York City. The beloved wife of Arthur for 59 years, she is survived by her brother Murray Levitan; her daughter Jane Levinson and her husband Vic; her son Richard Malina and his wife Wendy; her grandchildren Nick, Lynn, Maggie, Tom (and their spouses Julie, Roderick, David, Liz), Cathy, and Emily; her great-grandchildren Nate, Zack, Owen, Emma, Ben, Asher, and Estelle. She was cared for with great devotion by Mary, Marcel, and Bega in her later years. She was one of a kind, and we will all miss her dearly. 1/3
